aboutSec.title: About Us
aboutSec.subtitle: Learn more about us
aboutSec.description: Altoukhy Glass launched in 1998 as a specialist company in glass works, supplying and installing all types of glass works. Altoukhy Glass takes a keen commitment to serving their clients and providing them with the highest quality of glass works with prompt installation and suitable prices.

quality.title: Quality
quality.desc: We ensure the highest quality in all our glass products, meeting international standards and exceeding customer expectations.

executionSpeed.title: Execution Speed
executionSpeed.desc: Fast and efficient project execution, ensuring every task is delivered on time with no compromise on the quality of results provided.

latestDesigns.title: Latest Designs
latestDesigns.desc: Our glass solutions feature cutting-edge design inspired by modern trends, bringing innovation and style to every project we complete.

safety.title: Safety
safety.desc: Prioritizing safety in every step, our products are rigorously tested to meet strict standards while ensuring safety for all involved.

supply.title: Supply
supply.desc: Reliable supply chain management ensures timely delivery of all materials, partnering with trusted providers to meet client needs.

installation.title: Installation
installation.desc: Our professional team offers precise installation services, ensuring durability and a seamless finish for all glass-based projects.

contact.title: Contact Form
contact.locationSub: 20 Ahmed Fahim Bayoumi St., Nozha Area, Cairo
